Text: In re Doyle Claim Against Underwriters Cc Doyle I LLC ENA NEPCO EECC and Power Generation Investco LLP as insuredsassignees under a policy of insurance issued by Factory Mutual Insurance Co FM may file suit on Friday November against FM for a breach of contract and bad faith with regard to payment of a claim of approximately for an insured loss that occurred on or about June when the Unit engine at the Doyle I LLC facility located at Monroe Georgia failed If you are aware of any reason that suit should not be filed please call Britt Davis at or email him at mailto If he does not hear from you by Thursday November at pm he will assume you have no objection to the filing of this suit Sent on behalf of Britt Davis

Litigation Unit CLE Ethics Seminar November Cc Thank you for your RSVP to the abovereferenced event which will take place Wednesday November in the LaSalle Room A of the Doubletree Hotel at Allen Center The room is located on the second floor of the hotel Professor Dzienkowskis presentation will take place from after which there will be an open bar and hors doerves We in the Litigation Unit look forward to seeing you there

Service of Congressional Subpoenas Cc Please be advised that a copy of a Congressional Subpoena issued January and accepted for you by Robert S Bennett on January is being hand delivered to your office In the event you are represent by counsel please provide a copy of this Subpoena to your counsel Please be advised that responsive documents are due by February Becky Zikes

Invitation Enron Litigation Unit CLE Ethics Seminar Cc YOU ARE INVITED Its November and again time for the Enron Litigation Units Annual Ethics Seminar Please join us on Wednesday November at pm at the Doubletree HotelDowntown Houston LaSalle A for University of Texas Professor John Dzienkowskis entertaining presentation After Professor Dzienkowskis presentation ends at pm please stay for an open bar and hors doeurves The Unit is applying to the Texas Bar for one hour of ethics credit Please RSVP by email or phone to Becky Zikes at
